name: project1-blogging-site-
description: This project is based on blogging sites like instagram bloggers.com and linkedin  as well as other platforms. where people express their thoughts by writting content  on a website #  A BOUT API's # In this project there are total four (4) API's are present(crud-operation) 01.POST API==> FOR CREATING AUTHOR 02.POST==>FOR LOGIN AND CREATING JWT(JSON WEB TOKEN) 03.POST==>FOR CREATING BLOG DATA 04.GET==>FOR GETING PARTICULAR DATA OF BLOG
